name: Russell Lee VANCE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Vance v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of June, 2007, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

927 A.2d 201
Russell Lee VANCE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
